name: LOGistICAL: Brazil
description: LOGistICAL: Brazil is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 2000 towns to complete including cities like Brasilia, Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo, Salvador and Belo Horizonte and many, many more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
